idea-plugin.name: Symbols for JavaScript
idea-plugin.description:
In JavaScript we quite often use strings as some kind of identifiers. Event and module names are good examples here.

A good IDE should support this in my opinion. With this plugin you can define a format of your symbols (via RegExp). Each JavaScript string matching this format becomes a 'symbol' which you can rename(Shift + F6), find usages of (Alt + F7) or Go To (CTRL + Click).

By default all strings in format ':hyphen-identifier' are symbols but you can configure recognized formats in File -> Settings -> Other Settings -> JavaScript Symbols.

Find more details on project home page.
